prompts: Create a powerful fighting-type Pokemon with striking blue and white colors.
Show me a unique Pokemon that excels in martial arts with a bold presence.
Generate an image of a dual-type Pokemon that embodies strength and agility.
Design a legendary Pokemon with a fierce appearance and a connection to nature.
Imagine a Pokemon that can master both water and fighting moves with style.
Make a dynamic Pokemon that showcases traditional martial arts in its design.
Give me a Pokemon that represents the spirit of a warrior with a mystical aura.
